title: Community Management
description: In the BlockID Admin Console screen, administrators can add a new community under their tenancy for each of their clients. The default will be created for each tenant. Onboarding a new community (or client) enables the community to leverage all the features and functionalities of this platform yet maintain security by logical isolation of all service components. The tenantâ€™s DNS name will be the same for each of the communities. The service components are listed below:
